title: Ollama
summary: The official Ollama project - get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript library for interacting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama - simple interface for running LLMs locally.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, enabling use in LangChain workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Web UI for Ollama with ChatGPT-like interface, model management, and more.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line interface for Ollama with additional features.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like AI coding assistant powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot integration for Ollama, allowing chat with LLMs in Discord servers.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that integrates Ollama models into Slack workspaces for team collaboration.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit web interface for Ollama with real-time streaming and model selection.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) implementation using Ollama and vector databases.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Docker containers and docker-compose setups for running Ollama in containerized environments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Kubernetes Helm charts for deploying Ollama in cloud-native environments.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of models compatible with Ollama.

title: ollama-experts
summary: Specialized expert models fine-tuned for specific domains and tasks.
